title: Hi need to identify the font on this logo!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415135123im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hutch%20logo%20copy_5573.jpg)

would really be greatful if someone could identify the font used in the logo!

 [‹ lost typeface "GALLERY"](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415135123/http:/www.typophile.com/node/21285 "Go to previous forum topic") [New soccer font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415135123/http:/www.typophile.com/node/21287 "Go to next forum topic")
author: skassi

comments.content:
Here a slightly bigger image.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415135123im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hutch_2_5320.jpg)

Could it be a (heavily) modified [Dione Bold Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415135123/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/dione/)?

Isn’t it custom by Miles Newlyn?

Tim

Probably custom made, though Petrol Italic comes close.  
 [http://www.fonts.com/FindFonts/detail.htm?pid=402059](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415135123/http:/www.fonts.com/FindFonts/detail.htm?pid=402059 "http://www.fonts.com/FindFonts/detail.htm?pid=402059")
